faqs.question: How much water can I save with a proper irrigation system?
faqs.answer: A well-designed, smart irrigation system can reduce water usage by 30-50% compared to manual watering, while maintaining a healthier landscape.

faqs.question: How often should I have my irrigation system serviced?
faqs.answer: We recommend a professional check-up at least twice a year - in spring to ensure proper startup, and in fall to prepare for winter.

faqs.question: Can you upgrade my existing irrigation system?
faqs.answer: Yes, we can assess your current system and recommend upgrades to improve efficiency, such as adding smart controllers or replacing outdated components.

faqs.question: Are your irrigation systems environmentally friendly?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. We prioritize water conservation and use EPA WaterSense certified products when possible to ensure environmental responsibility.

faqs.question: How long does it take to install an irrigation system?
faqs.answer: Installation time varies depending on the size and complexity of your landscape, but most residential systems can be installed in 1-3 days.

faqs.question: Can irrigation systems be used for both residential and commercial properties?
faqs.answer: Yes, we design and install irrigation systems for properties of all sizes, from small residential gardens to large commercial landscapes.
